body_text: Technically, it's not intended to ever be called without options, so you're correct that it's unnecessary. I've removed the explicit check and set a default options param, e.g. ..({ options = [] }) {...
body: Technically, it's not intended to ever be called without `options`, so you're correct that it's unnecessary. I've removed the explicit check and set a default `options` param, e.g. `..({ options = [] }) {...`
body_html: Technically, it's not intended to ever be called without options, so you're correct that it's unnecessary. I've removed the explicit check and set a default options param, e.g. ..({ options = [] }) {...
